title: Wholesome Person Rescues Kitten Separated From Its Mother During Hurricane, Becomes Instantly Attached Despite Insisting That They Are 'Not a cat person'
description: Our feline-shaped hearts go out to all of those affected by the storms this season. Many people are being displaced by the hurricanes, but what a lot of people don't think about are the animals that are also being affected. One smol tortie kitten got separated from its mother, but luckily enough, one kindhearted hooman was there to help (you know we can't resist a story with a happy ending). After finding the adorably tiny fur baby, the man who described himself as 'NOT a cat person' walked around for hours with the kitten in hand to find its mother.They may not have found the kitten's momma, but the kitten certainly found a new papa! The new cat pawrent instantly fell in love with this tiny tortie and they are growing together despite life's challenges. Scroll down to read the whole story below, and if you can, try to find ways to help out with animals being displaced by the storms. Every little bit counts!
author: Blakeseidel
excerpt: Wholesome Person Rescues Kitten Separated From Its Mother During Hurricane, Becomes Instantly Attached Despite Insisting That They Are 'Not a cat person' - World's largest collection of cat memes and other animals

html:
Our feline-shaped hearts go out to all of those affected by the storms this season. Many people are being displaced by the hurricanes, but what a lot of people don't think about are the animals that are also being affected. One smol tortie kitten got separated from its mother, but luckily enough, one kindhearted hooman was there to help (you know we can't resist a story with a happy ending). After finding the adorably tiny fur baby, the man who described himself as 'NOT a cat person' walked around for hours with the kitten in hand to find its mother.

They may not have found the kitten's momma, but the kitten certainly found a new papa! The new cat pawrent instantly fell in love with this tiny tortie and they are growing together despite life's challenges. Scroll down to read the whole story below, and if you can, try to find ways to help out with animals being displaced by the storms. Every little bit counts!
